metadata.title: CVE-2018-16420 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Several buffer overflows when handling responses from an ePass 2003 Card indecrypt_response in libopensc/card-epass2003.c in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards to cause adenial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact.

criterions.comment: opensc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
